bio: This cat loves to mod games and play Taiko no Tatsujin, but he gets stressed out easily, so keep an eye on him. OC by @OisouoMatho

soultimate.name: Chaotic Codes
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: Techniques take 30% less time to charge.
skill.name: Charge Ahead
